parameters.name: FilterDoc
parameters.description: The `db.currentOp()` command that is used to filter sessions. For more information, see [db.currentOp()](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/method/db.currentOp/) of MongoDB Documentation.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The node ID.

>  If you do not specify a node ID, the sessions of the primary node are queried by default.

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description: A reserved parameter. You do not need to specify the parameter.
